text: Bound for Glory (2012) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA). It was held on October 14, 2012 at the Grand Canyon University Arena in Phoenix, Arizona. It was the eighth Bound for Glory event that TNA held. This was the first time that TNA held an event in the state of Arizona. There were eight matches on the card. The main event saw Jeff Hardy defeat Austin Aries to win the TNA World Heavyweight Championship. ==Matches== # Results Stipulations Times 1P Rob Van Dam defeated Zema Ion (c) Singles match for the TNA X Division Championship 8:04 2 Samoa Joe (c) defeated Magnus Singles match for the TNA Television Championship 9:15 3 James Storm defeated Bobby Roode Street Fight with King Mo as the special guest enforcer 17:35 4 Joey Ryan defeated Al Snow Singles match. When Ryan won, he received a TNA contract. 8:32 5 Chavo Guerrero and Hernandez defeated The World Tag Team Champions of the World (c) (Christopher Daniels and Kazarian) and A.J. Styles and Kurt Angle Three-way tag team match for the TNA World Tag Team Championship 15:39 6 Tara defeated Miss Tessmacher (c) Singles match for the TNA Women's Knockout Championship 6:21 7 Aces & Eights (D.O.C. and Knux) defeated Sting and Bully Ray No Disqualification tag team match. Since they won, Aces & Eights gained full access to the Impact Zone. 10:51 8 Jeff Hardy defeated Austin Aries (c) Singles match for the TNA World Heavyweight Championship 23:03 (c) â€“ refers to the champion(s) heading into the match ==References== Category:2012 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Phoenix, Arizona Category:Total Nonstop Action Wrestling pay-per-view events Category:2012 in the United States Category:2010s in Phoenix Category:October 2012 events
title: Bound for Glory (2012)
